questions: The group mixes a mystery drink—you must take a sip!
Drink whatever the person on your right is drinking.
Take a shot while balancing on one foot.
Take a shot with no hands.
Close your eyes and pick a random drink in front of you.
Mix two random drinks together and drink it.
Take a shot through a straw.
Let the group add a “surprise” ingredient to your drink.
Take a shot but let someone else feed it to you.
Spin a bottle—whoever it lands on, you both take a shot.
